item.title: Confirmation hearings live updates: Bondi questioned on independence, Rubio voices support for NATO
item.description: The Senate is accelerating the confirmation process Wednesday for President-elect Donald Trump’s Cabinet choices, scheduling half a dozen hearings.

item.title: Rubio leans into Trump’s ‘America First’ vision
Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President-elect Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washi...

item.title: Bondi: The FBI director ‘would fall under me’
The questions Pete Hegseth wouldn’t answer
item.description: Hegseth awkwardly skirted firm answers on a number of topics related to his personal baggage and what he would do as defense secretary.
